mutants.code:
def calculate_ber_cola_distribution(n, b, current_volumes):
    total_current_volume = sum(current_volumes)
    max_current_volume = max(current_volumes)
    if max_current_volume * n - total_current_volume >= b:
        return -1
    equal_volume = (total_current_volume + b) / n
    volumes_to_add = [equal_volume - vol for vol in current_volumes]
    return volumes_to_add

def calculate_ber_cola_distribution(n, b, current_volumes):
    total_current_volume = sum(current_volumes)
    max_current_volume = max(current_volumes)
    if max_current_volume * n - total_current_volume <= b:
        return -1
    equal_volume = (total_current_volume + b) / n
    volumes_to_add = [equal_volume - vol for vol in current_volumes]
    return volumes_to_add

def calculate_ber_cola_distribution(n, b, current_volumes):
    total_current_volume = sum(current_volumes)
    max_current_volume = max(current_volumes)
    if max_current_volume * n - total_current_volume != b:
        return -1
    equal_volume = (total_current_volume + b) / n
    volumes_to_add = [equal_volume - vol for vol in current_volumes]
    return volumes_to_add
